summary: Skaal clothes HD revival is a high quality retexture of skaal clothes from the Dragonborn DLC.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4]Skaal clothes HD revival is a high quality retexture for skaal clothes from the Dragonborn dlc.[/color][color=#f4f4f4] I think this armor deserves attention, cause it so fits the feel of a very cold winter area of Skyrim. In my opinion, Skaal's clothes is one of the best vanilla stuff, so I tried to make it better.

[/color][url=https://flic.kr/p/w83qmb][/url][center][url=https://flic.kr/p/w83qmb][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/L3FkrZ][img]https://c8.staticflickr.com/9/8771/28910005575_f2beb91039_c.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

[url=http://jpegshare.net/][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/8c/07/8c073b225733089a50c8a2177e4705ed.png[/img][/url]

[/font][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4]Open[/color] [color=#3c78d8]Skaal clothes HD revival[/color] [color=#f4f4f4]archive and extract[/color] [color=#3c78d8]texture[/color] [color=#f4f4f4]files into your DATA folder.[/color]
[color=#f4f4f4]Overwrite old files if it will be necessary.[/color]
[/font]


[url=http://jpegshare.net/][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/03/1f/031fc7efb1fe6b21f48ae0a14cca8d44.png[/img][/url]

[font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4]Do not reupload textures to other sites without permission. If you want to share files, contact me first. I don't want to see any part of it modified and shared on nexus or other sites without my permission.
[/color][/font][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4]Texture files are onle for private use and personal edition.[/color][/font]
[/size]
[size=3]========
[/size][b][youtube]rAQByaCHTCk[/youtube][/b]
[b][youtube]-_GpWzBpCg0[/youtube][b][b][youtube]VIRuTS81jSY[/youtube]
[b][size=3]========[/size][/b][/b][/b][/b]
[font=Georgia][color=#f1c232]WOW![/color][/font]
[font=Georgia][color=#f1c232]SO FUR[/color]
[/font][url=https://flic.kr/p/pBRZpu][img]https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3956/15502036622_13a4942481_c.jpg[/img]
[color=#f1c232]
[/color][/url][font=Georgia][color=#f1c232]MUCH WARM
[url=https://flic.kr/p/pzRfKY][img]https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3944/15479260166_513d436f57_c.jpg[/img]

[/url][/color][/font][font=Georgia][size=4]
Many many thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6879930/]jesusoden[/url] for helping with screenshots :з[/size][/font][font=Tahoma][color=#ead1dc]
[/color][/font]
author: redtox
